description.summary: A collection of fun demos to work efficiently with LLMs.
description.problem_solved: Provides example projects demonstrating various approaches to working with large language models.
description.impact: Helps users quickly explore and learn different techniques for integrating or using LLMs in their projects.
challenges: Ensuring demos are simple enough to be approachable while still showcasing useful LLM capabilities.
description.relevance: Demonstrates how to create practical, instructive examples for learning and leveraging LLMs.

architecture.overview: This project contains multiple demos, each located in its own branch, illustrating different functionalities and approaches for working with LLMs. The main branch includes a README that summarizes available demos and their purpose.

components.name: README.md
components.description: Central documentation file listing demos and basic instructions.

design_decisions.decision: Use separate branches for each demo.
design_decisions.reasoning: Keeps each demo self-contained and avoids clutter on the main branch.

performance_optimizations.optimization: Minimal code footprint in main branch.
performance_optimizations.impact: Allows quick navigation and a clear overview of available demos.

lessons_learned: Organizing demos by branch can simplify user discovery and maintain code clarity.

files.description: Provides an overview of the demos and instructions on where to find them.
